title: How good is Ezreal???
body:
How good is {{champion:81}} in this current meta?

Is he a good pick? 

Worth mastering or???

replies.body: Right now hes fairly good. Not the best adc, but not the worst either. Hes usually a safe pick, used in specific situations. Like I will only pick {{champion:81}}  against squishier team comps. {{champion:81}}  is NOT a tank buster. So if the enemy team has say {{champion:201}} , {{champion:122}}  and {{champion:254}} .....then stay away from {{champion:81}} . Hes a solid pick.....but pay attention to enemy team comp when deciding to play him or not
He's normally picked as a safety net pick/pocket pick.  He's not good, not bad... just safer.
